mapper.select:
SELECT aa.ID AS id, aa.Inventory_ID AS inventoryId, aa.Item_Name AS itemName, aa.STATUS AS STATUS, ai.item_Type AS itemType, aa.Item_Count AS itemCount, aa.COMMIT AS COMMIT, aa.Reviewer AS reviewer, aa.Review_Time AS reviewTime, aa.Review_Commit AS reviewCommit, aa.Create_Time AS createTime, aa.Creator AS creator FROM appliance_apply aa LEFT JOIN appliance_inventory ai ON aa.Inventory_ID = ai.ID WHERE aa.Delete_Flag = 0 AND aa.Creator = #{creator} AND aa.Status = #{status} AND aa.Create_Time >= #{createTimeBegin}
AND aa.Create_Time <= #{createTimeEnd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO appliance_apply (Inventory_ID, Item_Name, Item_Count, Status, Commit, Creator, Create_Time, Delete_Flag) values ( #{inventoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 0, #{commit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE appliance_apply SET Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Reviewer = #{reviewer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Review_Time = #{reviewTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Review_Commit = #{reviewCommit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Update_Time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT Item_Count AS itemCount FROM appliance_apply WHERE Delete_Flag = 0 AND ID = #{id}
